entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 09:53 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: SE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
